OutlandGenes.XenoImplanterGeneTemplateDe.label: {0} implanter
OutlandGenes.XenoImplanterGeneTemplateDe.description: Carriers of this gene are capable of turning other pawns into a {0} xenotype. Doing so will put the target into a temporary coma while they adapt to their new genes, and will require the carrier to regrow the genes to reimplant again safely.\n\nNote: implanting too quickly after the previous attempt will kill the carrier.
